select po.uuid, po.year, po.positionCode, po.positionName,pe.permissionCode,pe.permissionName, IF(containAmount = 1, 'Y', 'N') isAmount, IF(containCreate = 1, 'Y', 'N') isCreate, IF(containDelete = 1, 'Y', 'N') isDelete, IF(containUpdate = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUpdate, IF(containRead = 1, 'Y', 'N') isRead, IF(containConfirm = 1, 'Y', 'N') isConfirm, IF(containUnConfirm = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUnConfirm, IF(containVoid = 1, 'Y', 'N') isVoid, IF(containUnVoid = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUnVoid, IF(containPost = 1, 'Y', 'N') isPost, IF(containUnPost = 1, 'Y', 'N') isUnPost, IF(containPrint = 1, 'Y', 'N') isPrint, IF(containExport = 1, 'Y', 'N') isExport from position po left join permission pe on po.uuid = pe.uuid
pe.permissionCode is not null
and po.year = #{year}
and ( lower(po.positionCode) like lower('%${code}%') or lower(po.positionName) like lower('%${code}%') )
